meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bob Danielson George Lynch Ann Antell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #360.

td.p: Bob Danielson, a financial analyst from Miami Springs, Florida
George Lynch, a graphic artist and a prt time minister from West Hollywood, California
Ann Antell, a teacher from Ypsilanti, Michigan (whose 3-day cash winnings total $18,110)

tr.td: ROCK 'N ROLL
ASTRONOMY
SPORTS
AMERICAN INDIANS
BRITISH CLOTHING
"COCK" A DOODLE DO

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
